title: NFL Divisional-Round Weekend, Part 2
description:
Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti share instant reactions to the Buccaneers' triumph over the Saints (00:40) and the Chiefs hanging on to beat the Browns (15:30). Later, they discuss the news that Brandon Staley is joining the Chargers as their next head coach and how it could lead Brian Daboll to the Texans (37:30).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
